name: Crazy Susan
description:
The chef has always been a little strange but today things have really gone off the rails. The Lazy Susan has gone Crazy and food is flying all over the place.

Luckily there are 4 hungry customers in. Feed them what they want and you might still make a profit from this.

Left and Right arrows to turn your spatula, Space Bar to Shove the Food. Up Arrow To Boost the Crazy Susan. Do what you can. Chaos is inevitable.

(Don't worry about being told 'Wrong' a lot, its always better to deliver food to a plate than let it go to waste...)

For Kenney Jam 2021 - Theme: Rotation

All graphical assets by Kenney except Fresh Pickle font by Kurnia Setyadi | dafont.com

All audio by Kenney except annoying theme by DigNZ
